statements.statements: for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(fields in $L.datadict.old)) do ($L.x=index($L.i in fields in $L.datadict.old, fields in $L.datadict.new);if ($L.x>0) then (if (same($L.i in captions in $L.datadict.old, $L.i in fields in $L.datadict.old) or same($L.i in captions in $L.datadict.old, jscall("tableFunctions.getDefaultCaption", $L.i in fields in $L.datadict.old))) then ($L.i in captions in $L.datadict.old=$L.x in captions in $L.datadict.new) else ($L.i in captions in $L.datadict.old=nullsub(jscall("patchrelHelper.getUpgradeFieldValue", name in $L.datadict.old, "captions",
